property.name: preHeaderStyle
property.label: Pre-header style
property.description: Colour theme style used for rendering the pre-header.

property.name: preHeaderLink
property.label: Pre-header link
property.description: Label and URL for the pre-header in Markdown link format.

property.name: preHeaderLogo
property.label: Pre-header logo
property.description: URL of the image for the pre-header logo with Alternative Text in Markdown URL format.

property.name: ctaOneLink
property.label: Call to Action link one
property.description: Label and URL for the call to action in Markdown link format. Leave blank if no cta is desired.

property.name: ctaOneIcon
property.label: Icon name for Call to Action link one
property.description: Font Awesome css classes to be applied.

property.name: ctaTwoLink
property.label: Call to Action link two
property.description: Label and URL for the call to action in Markdown link format. Leave blank if no cta is desired.

property.name: ctaTwoIcon
property.label: Icon name for Call to Action link two
property.description: Font Awesome css classes to be applied.

property.name: searchLabel
property.label: Search label
property.description: Label of the search buttons. Leave blank to disable search.

property.name: searchFieldLabel
property.label: Search field label
property.description: Label of the search field when search is expanded.

property.name: menuLabel
property.label: Menu label
property.description: Label used for the menu button.

property.name: contentId
property.label: Content Id
property.description: HTML Id of the content section. Make certain it is unique on the page.

property.name: mainNavId
property.label: Menu main nav Id
property.description: HTML Id of the main navigation menu. Make certain it is unique on the page.

property.name: headerStyle
property.label: header style
property.description: Colour theme style used for rendering the pre-header.

property.name: headerUrl
property.label: Header URL
property.description: URL the user is taken to when clicking on the header. Leave empty for home page.

property.name: siteLogo
property.label: Site logo
property.description: URL of the image and alternative text for the site logo in Markdown link format. Leave URL empty for the default Queensland Coat of Arms.

property.name: siteLogoSecondary
property.label: Site logo (secondary)
property.description: URL of the image for the secondary site logo - this will hide the title and subtitle, and he site title is used as alternative text. Leave blank if no secondary logo is desired.

property.name: siteLogoSecondaryMobile
property.label: Site logo (secondary mobile)
property.description: URL of the image for the secondary site logo on mobile. If left blank, the non-mobile logo will be used on mobile too.

property.name: title
property.label: Site title
property.description: Provides user context of the product or service.

property.name: subtitle
property.label: Site descriptor
property.description: Provides user context of the cluster/department/agency if required.

property.name: className
property.label: Class name
property.description: Additional CSS class to be applied.
